statements: DELETE FROM drug_resistance_tracking WHERE pathogen_id = 1 AND drug_name = 'Drug A';
DELETE FROM drug_resistance_tracking WHERE resistance_level = 'High' AND data_source = 'Lab Test Results' AND pathogen_id = 2;
DELETE FROM drug_resistance_data WHERE patient_id = 1 AND pathogen_id = 2;
DELETE FROM drug_resistance_data WHERE patient_id = 1 AND pathogen_id = 3;
DELETE FROM drug_resistance_trends WHERE pathogen_id = 1 AND date_recorded = '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM surveillance_data WHERE pathogen_id = 2 AND collected_from = 'Hospital A' AND collection_date < '2023-01-01'
